Dear [Client],
We are excited to update you about some helpful new features on the
Matbia platform!
1.Email + Text Alerts.
We’ll let you know about the important movements in your account.
A) Balance alerts: get notified when your account reaches below your set minimum amount
B) Transaction alerts: get notified when a transaction above your set amount is processed
C) Manual entry alert: receive a fraud-protection alert when your card number has been entered manually on a device.
2. Statements.
View, download and print a PDF statement of transactions,
deposits, donations, by summary or by detail.
3. Receipts.
View, download and print a single PDF receipt
for the total of all deposits.
4. Matbia cards on other Platform
In the last few moths we have worked with other charity platforms, credit card processors and gateways, to be able to accept Matbia card. Below is the status each of them.
We’d love to hear your feedback on how you’re enjoying Matbia so far. Please reach out to us at info@matbia.com with any questions, comments, or concerns.
Thank you for being a part of Matbia, a simplified charity solution.
